bibl.title: Coptic and Greek ostraca from Kom el-Nana
bibl.note: 1. Receipt for demosion payment [Coptic]. - 2. Document concerning synetheia payment [Coptic]. - 3. Receipt for synetheia payment, written in Greek, followed by a subscription in Coptic. Late 5th - early 6th century.

bibl.title: Late Roman pottery at Amarna and related studies

bibl.seg: CLACKSON Sarah, Coptic and Greek Ostraca from Kom el-Nana.

Jane FAIERS, with contributions by Sarah CLACKSON, Barry KEMP, Gillian PYKE and Richard REECE, Late Roman Pottery at Amarna and Related Studies = Egypt Exploration Society. Excavation Memoirs. 72 (London, 2005) pp. 245-262, 3 pll.

1. Receipt for demosion payment [Coptic]. - 2. Document concerning synetheia payment [Coptic]. - 3. Receipt for synetheia payment, written in Greek, followed by a subscription in Coptic. Late 5th - early 6th century.
